packageDescription:
3 month membership card will give you access to all our awesome
              amenities, spaces and group classes. There is no time limit, you
              can come and go whenever you like.

10 classes card will give you access to any 10 group classes. You
              can use the card as long as you like, there is no time limit. The
              card is rechargeable

You can buy this 1 day pass to join any group class you wish. Ther
              is no time limit, just choose the class you wish to attend.

12 month membership card will give you access to all our awesome
              amenities, spaces and group classes. There is no time limit, you
              can come and go whenever you like.
